name: Athena Finance
description: Athena allows users to deposit stablecoins and earn boosted yield from the Hummus platform, without having to stake their HUM and worry about accruing veHUM. Depositors are able to take advantage of our ample HUM supply and utilize that for a boosted yield in HUM. You can also provide liquidity for Athena and receive rewards of our governance and revenue-sharing token ATH.
